basics.name: David Kozak
basics.summary: A passionate software engineer and researcher interested in programming language desing, analysis, and implementation.

work.name: BeeeOn
work.summary: Worked on an Android application for IOT system. Added automated testing support.

work.name: Automated Analysis and Verification Research Group - VeriFIT
work.summary: Search-based testing of concurrent Java programs using noise injection. Integrated SearchBestie with RoadRunner, an open-source tool for dynamic analysis of concurrent Java programs. Designed and evaluated new heuristics for noise injection.

work.name: Aura
work.summary: Worked on an information system using JavaEE, Spring and Hibernate. JSF on the presentation layer and Spring and Hibernate in the backend.

work.name: JetBrains
work.summary: DSL engineering and language engineering in general. Converting Antrl4 grammar into MPS project. Automatic detection of formatting for a given language.

work.name: JetBrains
work.summary: Language engineering using MPS. Building and maintaining Domaing Specific Languages and IDE support for them.

work.name: Knowledge Technology Research Group, FIT BUT
work.summary: Worked on a search engine for semantically enhanced documents. Designed a distributed system with multiple types of components. Designed a special query language, a compiler and specialized searching algorithms. Backend components in Kotlin using Spring. Web frontend in TypeScript using React.

work.name: GraalVM Team, Oracle Labs
work.summary: Developing new static analysis methods for ahead-of-time compilers.

work.name: GraalVM Team, Oracle Labs
work.summary: Developing new static analysis methods for ahead-of-time compilers.

Faculty of Information Technology, Brno University of Technology
Faculty of Information Technology, Brno University of Technology

volunteer.summary: Helped foreign students during their Erasmus in Brno. Taught Czech lessons. Organized events for hundreds of Erasmus students. Communicated and cooperated with people from different cultures and backgrounds.
Organized and moderated meetings. Maintained the ESN office. Helped the president with running the club.
